--DECLARE @ModifiedSince DATETIME --SET @ModifiedSince = NULL --DECLARE @TopN INT --SET @TopN = 1000 --DECLARE @RoomID INT --SET @RoomID = 431
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT TOP (COALESCE(@TopN,3000)) CM.ChatMessageID AS MessageID, CM.ChatMessageText AS MessageText, CU.ChatUserNickname AS Nickname, CURecipient.ChatUserNickname AS Recipient, CM.ChatMessageCreatedWhen AS CreatedWhen, CM.ChatMessageLastModified AS MessageLastModified, CM.ChatMessageSystemMessageType AS SystemMessageType, CM.ChatMessageRejected AS IsRejected, CM.ChatMessageRecipientID AS RecipientID, CM.ChatMessageUserID AS AuthorID FROM Chat_Message AS CM LEFT JOIN Chat_User AS CU ON CM.ChatMessageUserID = CU.ChatUserID LEFT JOIN Chat_User AS CURecipient ON CM.ChatMessageRecipientID = CURecipient.ChatUserID WHERE CM.ChatMessageRoomID = @RoomID -- select messages which belong to this room AND (@ModifiedSince IS NULL OR ChatMessageLastModified > @ModifiedSince) AND ##WHERE## ORDER BY CM.ChatMessageLastModified DESC ) AS t1 ORDER BY t1.CreatedWhen
